upcoming_events.title: Hivestorm Competition
upcoming_events.description: Our team sets out to compete for 1st place in this upcoming Hivestorm competition. Competition details below.

upcoming_events.title: UB Lockdown Competition
upcoming_events.description: Our team will compete in this upcoming Lockdown Competition, hosted by University at Buffalo. GO WOLVERINES!

upcoming_events.title: Meeting with 3M Healthcare
upcoming_events.description: We will be meeting with the Security Director of 3M Healthcare! More information to follow!

upcoming_events.title: RMCCDC Qualifiers
upcoming_events.description: Our team will be competiting in National Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition Qualifiers. Send good vibes!

past_events.title: Meeting with the NSA
past_events.description: We'll hear from Cybersecurity/InfoSec industry experts from the NSA come talk to us about anything & how to work for the NSA. Possible Q&A at the end. Invite everyone you know!

past_events.title: First Club Meeting of Fall 2024
past_events.description: The first inaugural meeting for the Cybersecurity Club at UVU. We'll introduce the club, meet everyone, and vote for new leadership. Anyone is welcome to run for leadership!
